The website DailyWorldUpdate: us, which published the claim, is known for publishing satirical content and clearly states that everything on their website is fiction.
The included image does not show a 150: year-old "In God We Trust" sign being removed from the House Chamber entrance. It is an image from 2015 showing a sign being installed on a courthouse in Roane County, Tennessee.
The words: In God We Trust" have been visible above the rostrum inside the House Chamber since 1962, contradicting the claim that the sign was recently removed.
The expert: s verdict states that the claim is not a genuine news article and should not be considered as a factual event.
